nodes.name: Set Input Parameters
nodes.notes:
Extracts input parameters from parent workflow:
- method: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- deviceId: Specific device ID for single device operations
- filters: Query parameters for filtering (e.g., site=xyz&status=active)
- body: JSON body for POST/PUT operations

nodes.name: Check HTTP Method
nodes.notes: Routes request based on HTTP method

parameters.url: ={{ $env.GLUWARE_API_URL }}/devices{{ $('Set Input Parameters').item.json.deviceId ? '/' + $('Set Input Parameters').item.json.deviceId : '' }}{{ $('Set Input Parameters').item.json.filters ? '?' + $('Set Input Parameters').item.json.filters : '' }}

nodes.name: GET Devices
nodes.notes:
Retrieves device information from Gluware API
- No deviceId: Returns list of all devices
- With deviceId: Returns specific device details
- With filters: Returns filtered device list

nodes.name: POST/PUT/DELETE Devices
nodes.notes:
Handles POST, PUT, DELETE operations:
- POST: Create new device
- PUT: Update existing device
- DELETE: Remove device

nodes.name: Format Success Response
nodes.notes: Standardizes successful API responses with metadata

nodes.name: Validate Input
nodes.notes: Validates input parameters before making API call
